## pivot() function

Sorts the rows of a matrix according to the number of leading zeros and the magnitude of the first nonzero entry

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pivot<S>(matrix: Matrix<S>): RowOperationResult<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RowOperationResult<S>`
